rooms.room_name: Living Room & Kitchen combined area (Open Plan)
rooms.description: Serves as a minimalist living space with integrated kitchen; incorporates large window openings for natural light
Well-ventilated room located in the east per Vastu guidelines.
Largest bedroom oriented towards east for prosperity.
Small dedicated work/study space located near the balcony for natural light
Entertainment area with acoustic design and ambient lighting; located in the northwest corner to minimize noise interference
